/usr/bin/c++ -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/test_streaming.dir/tests/test_streaming.cu.o CMakeFiles/test_streaming.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o test_streaming   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib libcuda_zstd.a /usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so _deps/zstd-build/lib/libzstd.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
